admin.rawgApi-help: Paste here your free Api Key retrieved from https://rawg.io/signup
admin.composerAlert: Show Composer Alert on new discussions

forum.noConnection: Oops! The videogame database is currently unresponsive. Please check back at a later time.
forum.pageText: If you're wondering what games are coming up in 2021, we've put them all in one page. This list will be continually updated to act as a living, breathing schedule as new dates are announced, titles are delayed, and big reveals happen. This should help you plan out your next several months in gaming and beyond. As the gaming calendar is constantly changing, we highly recommend you bookmark this page.
forum.game-title-alert-box: Is this a discussion about a game?
forum.game-title-alert-box-description: If you are about to start a discussion about a game, in order to retrieve all the information, use ONLY the videogame name as a title (e.g. Call of Duty modern warfare) without other words.
